name: Bocce
description:
Play the most realistic version of bocce. A combination of realistic physics and attractive graphics makes this game one that you’ll want to keep playing for hours. Click “...More” to learn why you should download this App today!

You’ve always loved the ancient Italian game of Bocce, and now that you can play it anywhere and anytime.

Bocce is the only application currently in existence that has the realistic appearance and uses the same physics as the real world version. Challenge a friend or test your skill against the computer. This is as close to an authentic bocce playing experience as you can get on an iPhone, iPod Touch, or iPad.

First, you toss the small target ball onto the Bocce court, then the challenge begins. Each player takes a turn throwing a ball, trying to get closest to the target. Today, you are the green ball and you’re kicking butt! Needing only one more point to get the winning fifteen, you line up your shot and throw. Yes, you did it! Victory is yours and you prepare to play again.

You are going to have tons of fun with this game but you’ll also appreciate the smooth controls and interface simplicity. Everyone will find it easy to operate. All you need is some strategy and some practice to become a top player.

One player throws green balls, the other red. Always, the object is to land your ball as close to the small target ball as possible. Of course, the position of the target moves as player balls bump it around. That’s okay, just develop a keen eye and a steady hand and you’ll do fine. The first one to get fifteen points wins the game.

Check out the features you get in Bocce:

* Smooth, touchscreen controls
* Easy-to-use interface and game rules
* Attractive graphics
* Most realistic bocce experience on the mobile application market today
* Loads of fun for all ages
* Universal app works on iPhone, iPod Touch and iPad

This is a game that the whole family can play. Everyone enjoys the realistic gaming, based on physics, which provides challenging, addictive entertainment. You’ll be playing for hours at a time.

Download Bocce now and get in on the fun.
